main.name: Harry Ji
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use react and vue.js to develop pages
main.bio: Certified IT professional with 10+ years keep upgrading skills and experience at Full-stack Development.I offered one-stop creative solutions that included UI/UX Design, Development, Promotion, Hosting, and E-commerce services, building different Web and Mobile applications, including Andriod, IOS, Desktop, and Raspberry Pi Apps. In addition, I acted as a system engineer and database administrator. I already have provided successful business solutions for over 180 clients from Greater Vancouver to Victoria Island to Alberta in Canada and the USA, Taiwan, China, Thailand, Germany, and Japan ...
main.contactmessage: Welcome to contact me. Let me know how I can help you.

resume.skillmessage: cutting edge innovative and comprehensive skills

education.description: 93% score, learned real-world training in software architecture and development methodologies and processes.
Eight months finished 12 months courses, Learned comprehensive skill, design, development and internet promotion.
Learned fundamentals of coding, programming languages, and Information technology

work.title: Xotours Ltd.
work.description: XO TOURS Ltd. is the largest tour company in the Chinese community. This company has branches located in Canada, the USA, Taiwan, and China. I provide a tour booking system that includes creating multiple templates for different site sections, combined calendars, price tables, and shopping carts with comparison functions, related products, and payment features. I also created Apple and Andriod mobile applications.

work.title: MLI Canada Enterprises Corp.
work.description: MLI CANADA ENTERPRISE is a leading wholesaler, distributor, and factory broker of food packaging products. I advanced price management systems on this project, developed a multi-level pricing scheme for different customer segments, improved catalog management, and manage product attributes. Supported sales management, inventory management, and front-end customer search using other conditions.

work.title: Alive Health
work.description: Alive is a monthly Canadian natural health and wellness magazine. I provided an e-commerce system for selling their healthy products Online for their products branch.
